KDPTable.ZapocitatelnyDoplatekTT: The amount of countable co-payment is determined by SUKL. It is the amount credited towards the protection limit for the insured.
KDPTable.ZapocitatelnyDoplatekPacientTT: The co-payment amount is the difference between the maximum price in the pharmacy and the amount covered by public health insurance.
KDPTable.ZapocitatelnyDoplatekZP: Co-payments paid by the health insurance company
KDPTable.ZapocitatelnyDoplatekZPTT: The amount covered by the health insurance company, as determined by SUKL.
KDPTable.ZbytekDoLimitu: Amount remaining to be paid by the insured to reach the limit

KDPModal.title: Co-payment limit for insured persons
KDPModal.description: The co-payment limit for insured persons is the annual limit for countable co-payments for prescribed medicinal products and food for special medical purposes, partially covered by health insurance and dispensed in the Czech Republic.
KDPModal.subtitle: Limit breakdown according to the Public Health Insurance Act:
KDPModal.listItem1: 500 CZK for insured persons over 70 years of age (including the calendar year in which they turn 70)
KDPModal.listItem2: 500 CZK for insured persons who receive an invalidity pension for third-degree disability and have provided a copy of the decision on the third-degree invalidity pension, and for insured persons who have been recognized as disabled in the second or third degree, but have not been granted an invalidity pension due to not meeting the required insurance period, and have provided a copy of the medical report (from the time the fact is substantiated and only for the duration of the condition)
KDPModal.listItem3: 1,000 CZK for children under 18 years old and for insured persons over 65 years old (always including the calendar year in which they reach that age)
